      • rollDice

        public void rollDice()
        rollDice: returns the sum of two randomly generated numbers. Two randomly generated numbers were used to keep the probabilities of sums maintained. Sets the diceRoll field to the sum.

      • readInput

        public java.lang.String readInput(java.lang.String message,
                                  java.lang.String player)
        readInput: Prints a message and reads the users input using System.in.read(byte[]). Can read up to 50 bytes of information (about 50 characters) and will convert the input into a string to then return.
        Parameters:
        message - - A String to be printed before user input. player - A String for the
        player - - players name to represent
        Returns:
        The users input.
